dcterms:description: A dataset provided by the organizers of the NLP4IF 2019 workshop for the Sentence Level Classification (SLC) Task. The dataset consists of news articles in TXT format, with each article containing a title and body. The training set includes 16,965 sentences, with 4,720 labeled as propaganda and 12,245 as non-propaganda. The dataset is highly imbalanced and was used to evaluate transfer learning models for propaganda detection.
dcterms:title: NLP4IF 2019 Propaganda Detection Dataset
